verbose_text: In vitro studies showed that incubation of rat cultured hippocampal neurons with CPE-NFalpha1 enhanced FGF2 mRNA and protein expression which was inhibited by the Sp1 inhibitor mithramycin A, a transcription inhibitor actinomycin, and ERK inhibitor U0126, suggesting that CPE-NFalpha1 can upregulate FGF2 via ERK-Sp1 signaling cascade.
